tweet.0: Una buena noticia para los estudiantes de educación superior en proceso de graduarse. Con @MintrabajoCol, emitimos Decreto 616 de 2021, que permite que sus prácticas profesionales sean certificadas y tenidas en cuenta como experiencia laboral, dinamizando acceso al primer empleo.
tweet.1: Expedimos Decreto 612 de 2021 para ayudar a micro y pequeñas empresas en su reactivación. La medida ordena a @MinHacienda y @DIANColombia correr el calendario de impuesto de renta de las empresas, ampliando el plazo de pago a noviembre y así mejorar su flujo de caja.
tweet.2: Felicitamos a nuestra @FCFSeleccionCol que, con coraje, resiliencia y amor de patria, logró un valioso empate contra su similar de Argentina en su aspiración de clasificar al Mundial de Qatar 2022. Gracias, @MiSeleccion_
tweet.3: Nuestros deportistas nos siguen llenando de orgullo. Miguel Ángel 'Supermán' López se coronó campeón del Mont Ventoux en Francia, y puso en alto el nombre de Colombia. Gracias por tanta alegría, por ser un ejemplo para los jóvenes del país y motivarlos a cumplir sus sueños.
tweet.4: Es un privilegio que nuestro país cuente con dos océanos. Hoy, en el #DíaMundialDeLosOcéanos invito a todos los colombianos a cuidar esta riqueza natural, para que entre todos preservemos los ecosistemas marinos y las especies que hacen parte de estos.  https://t.co/ESlOX9xs5J

tweet.18: La @PoliciaColombia adoptará uniforme azul, alineándose a estándares internacionales de cuerpos de Policía, reforzando su naturaleza civil. Se incorpora color azul un atributo de transmite empatía, cortesía, tranquilidad y confianza para la ciudadanía 5/6
tweet.19: Revisaremos protocolos de la @PoliciaColombia para el uso legítimo de la fuerza y les daremos estricto cumplimiento. Radicaremos proyecto de ley para uso y comercio de armas no letales en Colombia. También expediremos en próximos días decreto que reglamenta armas traumáticas 4/6
tweet.20: Para seguir avanzando en el proceso de una Policía más cercana al ciudadano, fortaleceremos la formación y capacitación de sus hombres y mujeres. Implementaremos estándares profesionales en temas como uso de la fuerza, DD.HH., atención al ciudadano y procedimientos policiales 3/6
tweet.21: En el propósito de lograr excelencia en @PolicíaColombia vamos a contar con un nuevo Estatuto Disciplinario, reestructuraremos Inspección General y crearemos nuevo sistema para recibir quejas y denuncias. También mejoraremos las condiciones de los miembros de la institución. 2/6
tweet.22: Hoy anunciamos 10 líneas de acción con las que profundizamos la modernización del @mindefensa y la transformación integral de nuestra @PoliciaColombia En ese proceso fortalecemos política de DD.HH. y elevamos los estándares en la prestación del servicio al ciudadano 1/6

tweet.50: El Plan Nacional de Vacunación avanza con paso firme. Cifras de @MinSaludCol revelan que a corte de las 11:59 p.m. del 2 de junio hemos aplicado 10'697.683 vacunas, y llevamos 3'338.638 segundas dosis. Este miércoles se suministraron 314.716 biológicos.

tweet.62: Quinto. Con @MinInterior e @ICBFColombia instalaremos tres nuevos Sacúdete, que se suman al Coliseo de Quibdó y el sendero de Tutunendo para recreación y formación ciudadana. Y, en paralelo están las obras de infraestructura vial en ejecución y eran un anhelo de la región. (5/5)
tweet.63: Cuarto. Con @MinAgricultura tenemos la meta de llegar a 300 mil beneficiarios de Coseche y Venda a la Fija. Además, para 250 mil empresarios del campo con deudas, se les condona hasta el 95% de sus obligaciones para que puedan sembrar y esto se aplica también en Chocó (4/5)
tweet.64: Tercero. Habrá becas y financiamiento a los emprendedores, se instalará en la Universidad Tecnológica del Chocó de C-Emprende, y con @SENAComunica habrá cerca de 5 mil cupos de financiamiento con el Fondo Emprender, además de una nueva infraestructura física de formación. (3/5)
tweet.65: Segundo. Pedimos a empresas priorizar contratación de jóvenes entre 18 y 28 años y el Gobierno subsidia el 25% del salario, el pago de la seguridad social. También, a las autoridades abrir vacantes para primer empleo, para no exigir experiencia y que inicien su vida laboral (2/5)

text_translated.0: Good news for higher education students in the process of graduating. With @MintrabajoCol, we issue Decree 616 of 2021, which allows your professional internships to be certified and taken into account as work experience, boosting access to first employment.
text_translated.1: We issued Decree 612 of 2021 to assist micro and small businesses in their reactivation. The measure orders @MinHacienda and @DIANColombia to run the company's income tax schedule, extending the payment term to November and thus improve their cash flow.

text_translated.19: We will review @PoliciaColombia protocols for the legitimate use of force and give them strict compliance. We will file a bill for the use and trade of non-lethal weapons in Colombia. We will also issue in the coming days decree regulating traumatic weapons 4/6
text_translated.20: To further progress in the process of a police closer to the citizen, we will strengthen the training and training of its men and women. We will implement professional standards on issues such as use of force, HRD, citizen care and police procedures 3/6

text_translated.79: We are pleased that the 2023 P4G Summit is taking place in Colombia, an opportunity to continue actions to stop the ravages of climate change. We know that this generation will create the ethics of the 21st century so that, together, we protect the planet #P4GSeoulSummit https://t.co/mFIYXZpDIp
text_translated.80: #AEstaHora we participated, with world leaders, in #P4GSeoulSummit, organized by South Korean President Moon Jae-In, in which we discuss the challenges the planet has in the fight against climate change and the search for measures to mitigate its impacts. https://t.co/alQ6DorBIM
text_translated.81: We congratulate @marianapajon for his victory at the UCI BMX Supercross World Cup circuit in Bogotá, where he left the name of Colombia high. Thank you, champion, for another new joy for the country and for being a great example for young people and new generations.
text_translated.82: Today we want to thank the mothers of Colombia for their love of the family, their dedication to the country and for being the cornerstone of the Colombian home. To express my admiration and gratitude to them for sow peace and joy, and guide us to be a better family and a better nation. Happy #DíaDeLaMadre https://t.co/auB1GaUVmT
text_translated.83: The area of the accident is already secured by members of the @PoliciaColombia Cantagallo, south of Bolivar, and @COL_EJERCITO troops, for rescue work. All solidarity with the families of our heroes who always gave everything for the homeland. (2/2)
text_translated.84: We deeply regret the death of five heroes of our @PoliciaColombia, attached to @PoliciaAntiNar, in the helicopter accident recorded in the municipality of Cantagallo, south of Bolivar, in facts that are subject to investigation. (1/2)
text_translated.85: Congratulations @Eganbernal for his triumph in #giroditalia2021 and the fifth place of Daniel Felipe Martínez. The two are a sample of the talent, effort, dedication and resilience of our young Colombians. Thank you for so much joy and for putting up the name of the country. https://t.co/UqC7xaJdhr
text_translated.86: In our Government, we are clear that security care is accompanied by social investment. That is why we will accelerate the Social Plan del Cauca, as well as the works of Popayán airport and Los Próceres road, and strengthen education projects, agriculture and tertiary roads https://t.co/45Fy7qlmsL
text_translated.87: To ensure #Popayán safety, we will increase the city's foot force by 25%, with military assistance. We will advance supply and unlock processes. With @UIAFColombia we will traceability the money that finance those who cause harm to Colombians https://t.co/JnSppUD1yB
text_translated.88: In the Security Council at #Popayán we analyze the situation of vandalism, looting and low-intensity urban terrorism, and we show that behind these violent acts are illegal groups and dissidents that pay between $70,000 and $100,000 a day to execute these actions. https://t.co/yDYfyarqLm
text_translated.89: #AEstaHora in #Popayán with the Government team, we lead Security Council with local authorities and the leadership of #FuerzaPública, in order to evaluate the actions being taken to ensure public order in the capital of Cauca, and in the department. https://t.co/jVEjfEr9rN
text_translated.90: Today in the morning we share with the Caleños in different sectors of the capital of the Valley. We spoke to citizens, merchants, older adults and young people, who expressed their needs and nonconformism to us. We reiterate that, united and without violence, we will go ahead https://t.co/PESPMXtO5v
text_translated.91: We accompany our minister @karenabudi, @Ministerio_TIC at these difficult times, and we deeply regret the passing of her lady mother. On behalf of my family and colleagues in Government, all the solidarity and prayers for Mrs Joussette's eternal rest
text_translated.92: We walked the streets of #Cali, where we talk with citizens who reject violence, vandalism and blockades, and want the changes Colombia needs but building consensus; together and listening to each other we will go ahead. https://t.co/PRDY1wWyPn
text_translated.93: In #Cali we were at the Metropolitan Police Command in the capital of Valle del Cauca visiting our heroes of the Fatherland. We express our appreciation for their commitment to citizenship and reiterate the support and solidarity of all Colombians https://t.co/c0W0Eiq63S
text_translated.94: With this deployment we will protect the nation's strategic assets and productivity, and we will have all the intelligence capacity to let the country know the links that exist in many vandalic activities with organized groups throughout the department and in Cali. https://t.co/CiXNqIgl0j
text_translated.95: We want to announce that, given the disruption of public order in Cali and Valle del Cauca, starting tonight the maximum deployment of military assistance to support the work of the @PoliciaColombia and road unlocking, as a measure of protection of citizens' rights https://t.co/GhFUBsC5el
text_translated.96: We reiterate our respect for peaceful protest and the resounding rejection of violence. The country has always had open the channels for deliberation and consultation, but we do not negotiate neither the Constitution nor the law, because there cannot exist islands of anarchy in Colombia. https://t.co/3wy2omPoxE
